title: Workshop on Developing Volleyball Coaching Strategies Using a Constraints-Led Approach

context.prior_knowledge: Middle school-level volleyball fundamentals and understanding of game rules
context.additional_context: Weekend-intensive workshop format for working professionals, utilizing smartphone-based simplified data analysis tools

learning_goals: Learners can identify at least three tactical patterns of opposing teams through game video analysis.
Learners can design at least two representative learning tasks utilizing constraints (time/space/personnel).
Learners can develop adaptive practice scenarios that promote problem-solving skills.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
